POST.POST_BODY:
Hi,
My FBS = 93.00 mg/dl & normal range is 70-100
Urea = 14 , normal range = 13-45
Creatinine = 0.88 and normal range = 0.5 to 1.5

so based on above observation, please suggest me if i am Diabetes patient or not. if yes what remedies i have to do ?

RESPONSE.RESPONSE_BODY:
Hi, 

your results appear quite normal, from what was posted. 

Your FBS may be marginally on the high side (ideally it will be less than 90), but nothing to be particularly concerned about.  

The best way to check would be to have a glucose check 2 hours after eating.  if your levels are less than 120, then that would be reassuring.

Note though that things can change as the pregnancy progresses, so monitoring from time to time throughout pregnancy can be a good idea.
